text: Shep E. Gordon (born 1946) is an American talent manager, Hollywood movie agent, and producer. He was born in Jackson Heights, Queens. Gordon is featured in a 2013 documentary, Supermensch: The Legend of Shep Gordon, which was directed by Mike Myers. He is known for being the manager of Alice Cooper and former manager of Teddy Pendergrass. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Movie producers from New York City Category:People from Queens
title: Shep Gordon
